thread.section_title: White, Jacobs & Associates Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of White, Jacobs & Associates | whitejacobs.com
thread.title: Christopher Evans
thread.title_full: White, Jacobs & Associates reviewed by Christopher Evans

author: Christopher Evans
title: Christopher Evans
text: If you ever need any assistance on fixing your credit, ask for Elizabeth Turner. She listens very well, she takes time out to get a better understanding of you as a person, and I believe these are some of the right steps in great customer service. Overall, she pointed me in all the right directions that gave me answers to many of the questions I was concerned with. Now it's only up from here on my part.
